record.field:
Hello ${object.partner_id.firstname},


We have generated the yearly interest return of your voluntary shares contribution.

% if object.partner_bank_id:

Soon you'll receive a transfer on your IBAN account finished on: ${object.partner_bank_id.acc_number[-4:]}. % else:

Soon you'll receive a transfer on your IBAN account. % endif

The summary of the transaction:

  • Period: from ${object.voluntary_share_interest_return_id.start_date_period.strftime('%d/%m/%Y')} to ${object.voluntary_share_interest_return_id.end_date_period.strftime('%d/%m/%Y')}
  • Total contribution: ${str("%.2f" | format(object.voluntary_share_total_contribution)).replace('.',',')}€
  • Total interest: ${str("%.2f" | format(object.amount_untaxed)).replace('.',',')}€
  • Taxes: ${str("%.2f" | format(object.amount_tax)).replace('.',',')}€
  • Total to receive: ${str("%.2f" | format(object.amount_total)).replace('.',',')}€

Don't hesitate to contact us at ${object.company_id.email} for any question you might have using the code: ${object.name}

Thanks for your contribution helping generate our green energy.

Best regards,

${object.company_id.comercial_name}
